description:
Savol: Jism qanday tezlik bilan vertikal otilsa, u 6 s dan so‘ng otilgan joyiga qaytib tushadi (m/s)?
A) 20
B) 35
C) 30
D) 40
Yechim: Jismning vertikal yo‘nalishdagi harakati uchun, uchish va tushish vaqtlarining yig‘indisi 6 soniya, ya'ni 3 soniya uchish va 3 soniya tushish bo‘ladi (har bir yo‘nalishda teng vaqt).
Tushish va uchish vaqtining 3 sekundini hisobga olgan holda, erkin tushish tezligi \( g = 9.8 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 \) yordamida hisoblanadi.
Uchish va tushishning umumiy vaqti \( t = 6 \, 	ext{s} \), va u uchish vaqtining 3 soniyasida maksimal balandlikka yetadi. Vertikal harakat uchun quyidagi tenglama ishlatiladi:
   \[v_0 = g 	imes t = 9.8 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 	imes 3 \, 	ext{s} = 30 \, 	ext{m/s}.\]  Demak, javob C) 30.Savol: Moddiy nuqta 90 sm radiusli aylana bo‘ylab tekis harakatlanmoqda. Agar u 9 s da 90° ga burilgan bo‘lsa, uning burchak tezligi qancha (rad/s)?
A) 10
B) 45
C) π/18
D) 0,56
Yechim: Aylananing to‘liq burilish burchagi \( 2\pi \) radian. Moddiy nuqta 90° (yoki \(  rac{\pi}{2} \) radian) burilgan. Burchak tezligini hisoblash uchun, burchakni vaqtga bo‘lish kerak: 
\[\omega =  rac{\Delta 	heta}{\Delta t} =  rac{ rac{\pi}{2}}{9 \, 	ext{s}} =  rac{\pi}{18} \, 	ext{rad/s}.\] Demak, javob C.Savol: Dastlab tinch turgan 2 kg massali jism 3 N doimiy kuch ta’sirida tezlashmoqda. 6,5 minut vaqt davomida kuch bajargan ishni (kJ) hisoblang.
A) 98
B) 245
C) 342
D) 164
Yechim: Ishni hisoblash uchun quyidagi formula ishlatiladi: \[A = F 	imes d\]. Bu yerda \( F = 3 \, 	ext{N} \) (kuch), \( d \) esa harakat masofasi.
Jismning tezlanishini hisoblash uchun \( F = ma \) formulasidan foydalanamiz: \[a =  rac{F}{m} =  rac{3 \, 	ext{N}}{2 \, 	ext{kg}} = 1.5 \, 	ext{m/s}^2.\]
Jismning harakatlangan masofasini hisoblash uchun quyidagi tenglama ishlatiladi: \[d =  rac{1}{2} a t^2 \]. Bu yerda \( t = 6.5 \, 	ext{min} = 390 \, 	ext{s} \).
\[d =  rac{1}{2} 	imes 1.5 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 	imes (390 \, 	ext{s})^2 =  rac{1}{2} 	imes 1.5 	imes 152100 = 114075 \, 	ext{m}.\]
Endi ishni hisoblaymiz: \[A = 3 \, 	ext{N} 	imes 114075 \, 	ext{m} = 342225 \, 	ext{J} = 342.225 \, 	ext{kJ}.\] Demak, javob C.Savol: 2,7 kg massali muz boʻlagi ipga shunday osib qoʻyilganki, muzning chorak hajmi suvga botib turibdi. Ipdagi taranglik kuchini toping.
A) 19,5 N
B) 24 N
C) 18 N
D) 14,4 N
Yechim: Gravitatsion kuch: \[F_{	ext{grav}} = m \cdot g = 2,7 \cdot 10 = 27 \, 	ext{N}\]
Arximed kuchi: Muzning botgan hajmi \(  rac{V}{4} \), shuning uchun: \[F_{	ext{Arx}} = 1000 \cdot  rac{V}{4} \cdot 10 = 2500 \cdot V\]
Muzning hajmi \( V =  rac{2,7}{900} = 0,003 \, 	ext{m}^3 \), shuning uchun: \[F_{	ext{Arx}} = 2500 \cdot 0,003 = 7,5 \, 	ext{N}\]
Taranglik kuchi:\[T = F_{	ext{grav}} - F_{	ext{Arx}} = 27 - 7,5 = 19,5 \, 	ext{N}\] Demak, javob ASavol: 8 m/s tezlik bilan to‘g‘ri chiziqli tekis harakatlanayotgan chang‘ichi 25 s da qancha masofani bosib o‘tadi (m) ?
A) 50
B) 100
C) 150
D) 200
Yechim: To‘g‘ri chiziqli tekis harakatda masofa quyidagi formula bilan hisoblanadi:
\[s = v \cdot t\]
  - \( v \) — tezlik (\( 8 \, 	ext{m/s} \)),
   - \( t \) — vaqt (\( 25 \, 	ext{s} \)).
Masofani hisoblash:\[s = 8 \, 	ext{m/s} \cdot 25 \, 	ext{s} = 200 \, 	ext{m}\] Demak, javob D.

A) 6
B) 5
C) -1
D) 0
Yechim:

description:
Savol: Jism qanday tezlik bilan vertikal otilsa, u 6 s dan so‘ng otilgan joyiga qaytib tushadi (m/s)?
A) 20
B) 35
C) 30
D) 40
Yechim: Jismning vertikal yo‘nalishdagi harakati uchun, uchish va tushish vaqtlarining yig‘indisi 6 soniya, ya'ni 3 soniya uchish va 3 soniya tushish bo‘ladi (har bir yo‘nalishda teng vaqt).
Tushish va uchish vaqtining 3 sekundini hisobga olgan holda, erkin tushish tezligi \( g = 9.8 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 \) yordamida hisoblanadi.
Uchish va tushishning umumiy vaqti \( t = 6 \, 	ext{s} \), va u uchish vaqtining 3 soniyasida maksimal balandlikka yetadi. Vertikal harakat uchun quyidagi tenglama ishlatiladi:
   \[v_0 = g 	imes t = 9.8 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 	imes 3 \, 	ext{s} = 30 \, 	ext{m/s}.\]  Demak, javob C) 30.Savol: Moddiy nuqta 90 sm radiusli aylana bo‘ylab tekis harakatlanmoqda. Agar u 9 s da 90° ga burilgan bo‘lsa, uning burchak tezligi qancha (rad/s)?
A) 10
B) 45
C) π/18
D) 0,56
Yechim: Aylananing to‘liq burilish burchagi \( 2\pi \) radian. Moddiy nuqta 90° (yoki \(  rac{\pi}{2} \) radian) burilgan. Burchak tezligini hisoblash uchun, burchakni vaqtga bo‘lish kerak: 
\[\omega =  rac{\Delta 	heta}{\Delta t} =  rac{ rac{\pi}{2}}{9 \, 	ext{s}} =  rac{\pi}{18} \, 	ext{rad/s}.\] Demak, javob C.Savol: Dastlab tinch turgan 2 kg massali jism 3 N doimiy kuch ta’sirida tezlashmoqda. 6,5 minut vaqt davomida kuch bajargan ishni (kJ) hisoblang.
A) 98
B) 245
C) 342
D) 164
Yechim: Ishni hisoblash uchun quyidagi formula ishlatiladi: \[A = F 	imes d\]. Bu yerda \( F = 3 \, 	ext{N} \) (kuch), \( d \) esa harakat masofasi.
Jismning tezlanishini hisoblash uchun \( F = ma \) formulasidan foydalanamiz: \[a =  rac{F}{m} =  rac{3 \, 	ext{N}}{2 \, 	ext{kg}} = 1.5 \, 	ext{m/s}^2.\]
Jismning harakatlangan masofasini hisoblash uchun quyidagi tenglama ishlatiladi: \[d =  rac{1}{2} a t^2 \]. Bu yerda \( t = 6.5 \, 	ext{min} = 390 \, 	ext{s} \).
\[d =  rac{1}{2} 	imes 1.5 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 	imes (390 \, 	ext{s})^2 =  rac{1}{2} 	imes 1.5 	imes 152100 = 114075 \, 	ext{m}.\]
Endi ishni hisoblaymiz: \[A = 3 \, 	ext{N} 	imes 114075 \, 	ext{m} = 342225 \, 	ext{J} = 342.225 \, 	ext{kJ}.\] Demak, javob C.Savol: 2,7 kg massali muz boʻlagi ipga shunday osib qoʻyilganki, muzning chorak hajmi suvga botib turibdi. Ipdagi taranglik kuchini toping.
A) 19,5 N
B) 24 N
C) 18 N
D) 14,4 N
Yechim: Gravitatsion kuch: \[F_{	ext{grav}} = m \cdot g = 2,7 \cdot 10 = 27 \, 	ext{N}\]
Arximed kuchi: Muzning botgan hajmi \(  rac{V}{4} \), shuning uchun: \[F_{	ext{Arx}} = 1000 \cdot  rac{V}{4} \cdot 10 = 2500 \cdot V\]
Muzning hajmi \( V =  rac{2,7}{900} = 0,003 \, 	ext{m}^3 \), shuning uchun: \[F_{	ext{Arx}} = 2500 \cdot 0,003 = 7,5 \, 	ext{N}\]
Taranglik kuchi:\[T = F_{	ext{grav}} - F_{	ext{Arx}} = 27 - 7,5 = 19,5 \, 	ext{N}\] Demak, javob ASavol: 8 m/s tezlik bilan to‘g‘ri chiziqli tekis harakatlanayotgan chang‘ichi 25 s da qancha masofani bosib o‘tadi (m) ?
A) 50
B) 100
C) 150
D) 200
Yechim: To‘g‘ri chiziqli tekis harakatda masofa quyidagi formula bilan hisoblanadi:
\[s = v \cdot t\]
  - \( v \) — tezlik (\( 8 \, 	ext{m/s} \)),
   - \( t \) — vaqt (\( 25 \, 	ext{s} \)).
Masofani hisoblash:\[s = 8 \, 	ext{m/s} \cdot 25 \, 	ext{s} = 200 \, 	ext{m}\] Demak, javob D.
question: Tennis to‘pi raketkaga 7,5 m/s tezlik bilan urulib, 12,5 m/s tezlikda qaytgan bo‘lsa, raketkaning tezligi nimaga teng?

Muzning hajmi \( V =  rac{2,7}{900} = 0,003 \, 	ext{m}^3 \), shuning uchun: \[F_{	ext{Arx}} = 2500 \cdot 0,003 = 7,5 \, 	ext{N}\]

Savol: 2 rad/s burchak tezlik va 9 m/s chiziqli tezlik bilan aylanma harakat qilayotgan jismga ta’sir qiluvchi markazdan qocha kuch 36 N. Jismning massasini (kg) toping.
A) 2
B) 1
C) 0,33
D) 0,166
Yechim:

description:
Savol: Jism qanday tezlik bilan vertikal otilsa, u 6 s dan so‘ng otilgan joyiga qaytib tushadi (m/s)?
A) 20
B) 35
C) 30
D) 40
Yechim: Jismning vertikal yo‘nalishdagi harakati uchun, uchish va tushish vaqtlarining yig‘indisi 6 soniya, ya'ni 3 soniya uchish va 3 soniya tushish bo‘ladi (har bir yo‘nalishda teng vaqt).
Tushish va uchish vaqtining 3 sekundini hisobga olgan holda, erkin tushish tezligi \( g = 9.8 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 \) yordamida hisoblanadi.
Uchish va tushishning umumiy vaqti \( t = 6 \, 	ext{s} \), va u uchish vaqtining 3 soniyasida maksimal balandlikka yetadi. Vertikal harakat uchun quyidagi tenglama ishlatiladi:
   \[v_0 = g 	imes t = 9.8 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 	imes 3 \, 	ext{s} = 30 \, 	ext{m/s}.\]  Demak, javob C) 30.Savol: Moddiy nuqta 90 sm radiusli aylana bo‘ylab tekis harakatlanmoqda. Agar u 9 s da 90° ga burilgan bo‘lsa, uning burchak tezligi qancha (rad/s)?
A) 10
B) 45
C) π/18
D) 0,56
Yechim: Aylananing to‘liq burilish burchagi \( 2\pi \) radian. Moddiy nuqta 90° (yoki \(  rac{\pi}{2} \) radian) burilgan. Burchak tezligini hisoblash uchun, burchakni vaqtga bo‘lish kerak: 
\[\omega =  rac{\Delta 	heta}{\Delta t} =  rac{ rac{\pi}{2}}{9 \, 	ext{s}} =  rac{\pi}{18} \, 	ext{rad/s}.\] Demak, javob C.Savol: Dastlab tinch turgan 2 kg massali jism 3 N doimiy kuch ta’sirida tezlashmoqda. 6,5 minut vaqt davomida kuch bajargan ishni (kJ) hisoblang.
A) 98
B) 245
C) 342
D) 164
Yechim: Ishni hisoblash uchun quyidagi formula ishlatiladi: \[A = F 	imes d\]. Bu yerda \( F = 3 \, 	ext{N} \) (kuch), \( d \) esa harakat masofasi.
Jismning tezlanishini hisoblash uchun \( F = ma \) formulasidan foydalanamiz: \[a =  rac{F}{m} =  rac{3 \, 	ext{N}}{2 \, 	ext{kg}} = 1.5 \, 	ext{m/s}^2.\]
Jismning harakatlangan masofasini hisoblash uchun quyidagi tenglama ishlatiladi: \[d =  rac{1}{2} a t^2 \]. Bu yerda \( t = 6.5 \, 	ext{min} = 390 \, 	ext{s} \).
\[d =  rac{1}{2} 	imes 1.5 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 	imes (390 \, 	ext{s})^2 =  rac{1}{2} 	imes 1.5 	imes 152100 = 114075 \, 	ext{m}.\]
Endi ishni hisoblaymiz: \[A = 3 \, 	ext{N} 	imes 114075 \, 	ext{m} = 342225 \, 	ext{J} = 342.225 \, 	ext{kJ}.\] Demak, javob C.Savol: 2,7 kg massali muz boʻlagi ipga shunday osib qoʻyilganki, muzning chorak hajmi suvga botib turibdi. Ipdagi taranglik kuchini toping.
A) 19,5 N
B) 24 N
C) 18 N
D) 14,4 N
Yechim: Gravitatsion kuch: \[F_{	ext{grav}} = m \cdot g = 2,7 \cdot 10 = 27 \, 	ext{N}\]
Arximed kuchi: Muzning botgan hajmi \(  rac{V}{4} \), shuning uchun: \[F_{	ext{Arx}} = 1000 \cdot  rac{V}{4} \cdot 10 = 2500 \cdot V\]
Muzning hajmi \( V =  rac{2,7}{900} = 0,003 \, 	ext{m}^3 \), shuning uchun: \[F_{	ext{Arx}} = 2500 \cdot 0,003 = 7,5 \, 	ext{N}\]
Taranglik kuchi:\[T = F_{	ext{grav}} - F_{	ext{Arx}} = 27 - 7,5 = 19,5 \, 	ext{N}\] Demak, javob ASavol: 8 m/s tezlik bilan to‘g‘ri chiziqli tekis harakatlanayotgan chang‘ichi 25 s da qancha masofani bosib o‘tadi (m) ?
A) 50
B) 100
C) 150
D) 200
Yechim: To‘g‘ri chiziqli tekis harakatda masofa quyidagi formula bilan hisoblanadi:
\[s = v \cdot t\]
  - \( v \) — tezlik (\( 8 \, 	ext{m/s} \)),
   - \( t \) — vaqt (\( 25 \, 	ext{s} \)).
Masofani hisoblash:\[s = 8 \, 	ext{m/s} \cdot 25 \, 	ext{s} = 200 \, 	ext{m}\] Demak, javob D.

Savol: Jism qanday tezlik bilan vertikal otilsa, u 6 s dan so‘ng otilgan joyiga qaytib tushadi (m/s)?
A) 20
B) 35
C) 30
D) 40
Yechim: Jismning vertikal yo‘nalishdagi harakati uchun, uchish va tushish vaqtlarining yig‘indisi 6 soniya, ya'ni 3 soniya uchish va 3 soniya tushish bo‘ladi (har bir yo‘nalishda teng vaqt).
Tushish va uchish vaqtining 3 sekundini hisobga olgan holda, erkin tushish tezligi \( g = 9.8 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 \) yordamida hisoblanadi.
Uchish va tushishning umumiy vaqti \( t = 6 \, 	ext{s} \), va u uchish vaqtining 3 soniyasida maksimal balandlikka yetadi. Vertikal harakat uchun quyidagi tenglama ishlatiladi:
   \[v_0 = g 	imes t = 9.8 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 	imes 3 \, 	ext{s} = 30 \, 	ext{m/s}.\]  Demak, javob C) 30.Savol: Moddiy nuqta 90 sm radiusli aylana bo‘ylab tekis harakatlanmoqda. Agar u 9 s da 90° ga burilgan bo‘lsa, uning burchak tezligi qancha (rad/s)?
A) 10
B) 45
C) π/18
D) 0,56
Yechim: Aylananing to‘liq burilish burchagi \( 2\pi \) radian. Moddiy nuqta 90° (yoki \(  rac{\pi}{2} \) radian) burilgan. Burchak tezligini hisoblash uchun, burchakni vaqtga bo‘lish kerak: 
\[\omega =  rac{\Delta 	heta}{\Delta t} =  rac{ rac{\pi}{2}}{9 \, 	ext{s}} =  rac{\pi}{18} \, 	ext{rad/s}.\] Demak, javob C.Savol: Dastlab tinch turgan 2 kg massali jism 3 N doimiy kuch ta’sirida tezlashmoqda. 6,5 minut vaqt davomida kuch bajargan ishni (kJ) hisoblang.
A) 98
B) 245
C) 342
D) 164
Yechim: Ishni hisoblash uchun quyidagi formula ishlatiladi: \[A = F 	imes d\]. Bu yerda \( F = 3 \, 	ext{N} \) (kuch), \( d \) esa harakat masofasi.

Jismning harakatlangan masofasini hisoblash uchun quyidagi tenglama ishlatiladi: \[d =  rac{1}{2} a t^2 \]. Bu yerda \( t = 6.5 \, 	ext{min} = 390 \, 	ext{s} \).
\[d =  rac{1}{2} 	imes 1.5 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 	imes (390 \, 	ext{s})^2 =  rac{1}{2} 	imes 1.5 	imes 152100 = 114075 \, 	ext{m}.\]
Endi ishni hisoblaymiz: \[A = 3 \, 	ext{N} 	imes 114075 \, 	ext{m} = 342225 \, 	ext{J} = 342.225 \, 	ext{kJ}.\] Demak, javob C.Savol: 2,7 kg massali muz boʻlagi ipga shunday osib qoʻyilganki, muzning chorak hajmi suvga botib turibdi. Ipdagi taranglik kuchini toping.
A) 19,5 N
B) 24 N
C) 18 N
D) 14,4 N
Yechim: Gravitatsion kuch: \[F_{	ext{grav}} = m \cdot g = 2,7 \cdot 10 = 27 \, 	ext{N}\]
Arximed kuchi: Muzning botgan hajmi \(  rac{V}{4} \), shuning uchun: \[F_{	ext{Arx}} = 1000 \cdot  rac{V}{4} \cdot 10 = 2500 \cdot V\]

Taranglik kuchi:\[T = F_{	ext{grav}} - F_{	ext{Arx}} = 27 - 7,5 = 19,5 \, 	ext{N}\] Demak, javob ASavol: 8 m/s tezlik bilan to‘g‘ri chiziqli tekis harakatlanayotgan chang‘ichi 25 s da qancha masofani bosib o‘tadi (m) ?
A) 50
B) 100
C) 150
D) 200
Yechim: To‘g‘ri chiziqli tekis harakatda masofa quyidagi formula bilan hisoblanadi:
\[s = v \cdot t\]
  - \( v \) — tezlik (\( 8 \, 	ext{m/s} \)),
   - \( t \) — vaqt (\( 25 \, 	ext{s} \)).
Masofani hisoblash:\[s = 8 \, 	ext{m/s} \cdot 25 \, 	ext{s} = 200 \, 	ext{m}\] Demak, javob D.

A) 50
B) 100
C) 150
D) 200

\[s = v \cdot t\]
  - \( v \) — tezlik (\( 8 \, 	ext{m/s} \)),

system:
Savol: Jism qanday tezlik bilan vertikal otilsa, u 6 s dan so‘ng otilgan joyiga qaytib tushadi (m/s)?
A) 20
B) 35
C) 30
D) 40
Yechim: Jismning vertikal yo‘nalishdagi harakati uchun, uchish va tushish vaqtlarining yig‘indisi 6 soniya, ya'ni 3 soniya uchish va 3 soniya tushish bo‘ladi (har bir yo‘nalishda teng vaqt).
Tushish va uchish vaqtining 3 sekundini hisobga olgan holda, erkin tushish tezligi \( g = 9.8 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 \) yordamida hisoblanadi.
Uchish va tushishning umumiy vaqti \( t = 6 \, 	ext{s} \), va u uchish vaqtining 3 soniyasida maksimal balandlikka yetadi. Vertikal harakat uchun quyidagi tenglama ishlatiladi:
   \[v_0 = g 	imes t = 9.8 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 	imes 3 \, 	ext{s} = 30 \, 	ext{m/s}.\]  Demak, javob C) 30.Savol: Moddiy nuqta 90 sm radiusli aylana bo‘ylab tekis harakatlanmoqda. Agar u 9 s da 90° ga burilgan bo‘lsa, uning burchak tezligi qancha (rad/s)?
A) 10
B) 45
C) π/18
D) 0,56

A) 98
B) 245
C) 342
D) 164
Yechim: Ishni hisoblash uchun quyidagi formula ishlatiladi: \[A = F 	imes d\]. Bu yerda \( F = 3 \, 	ext{N} \) (kuch), \( d \) esa harakat masofasi.

\[d =  rac{1}{2} 	imes 1.5 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 	imes (390 \, 	ext{s})^2 =  rac{1}{2} 	imes 1.5 	imes 152100 = 114075 \, 	ext{m}.\]

  - \( v \) — tezlik (\( 8 \, 	ext{m/s} \)),
   - \( t \) — vaqt (\( 25 \, 	ext{s} \)).
Masofani hisoblash:\[s = 8 \, 	ext{m/s} \cdot 25 \, 	ext{s} = 200 \, 	ext{m}\] Demak, javob D.

D) 200

\[s = v \cdot t\]
  - \( v \) — tezlik (\( 8 \, 	ext{m/s} \)),
   - \( t \) — vaqt (\( 25 \, 	ext{s} \)).
Masofani hisoblash:\[s = 8 \, 	ext{m/s} \cdot 25 \, 	ext{s} = 200 \, 	ext{m}\] Demak, javob D.

B) 24 N
C) 18 N
D) 14,4 N

A) 50
B) 100
C) 150
D) 200

\[s = v \cdot t\]
  - \( v \) — tezlik (\( 8 \, 	ext{m/s} \)),
   - \( t \) — vaqt (\( 25 \, 	ext{s} \)).
Masofani hisoblash:\[s = 8 \, 	ext{m/s} \cdot 25 \, 	ext{s} = 200 \, 	ext{m}\] Demak, javob D.

   \[v_0 = g 	imes t = 9.8 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 	imes 3 \, 	ext{s} = 30 \, 	ext{m/s}.\]  Demak, javob C) 30.Savol: Moddiy nuqta 90 sm radiusli aylana bo‘ylab tekis harakatlanmoqda. Agar u 9 s da 90° ga burilgan bo‘lsa, uning burchak tezligi qancha (rad/s)?
A) 10
B) 45
C) π/18
D) 0,56
Yechim: Aylananing to‘liq burilish burchagi \( 2\pi \) radian. Moddiy nuqta 90° (yoki \(  rac{\pi}{2} \) radian) burilgan. Burchak tezligini hisoblash uchun, burchakni vaqtga bo‘lish kerak: 
\[\omega =  rac{\Delta 	heta}{\Delta t} =  rac{ rac{\pi}{2}}{9 \, 	ext{s}} =  rac{\pi}{18} \, 	ext{rad/s}.\] Demak, javob C.Savol: Dastlab tinch turgan 2 kg massali jism 3 N doimiy kuch ta’sirida tezlashmoqda. 6,5 minut vaqt davomida kuch bajargan ishni (kJ) hisoblang.
A) 98
B) 245
C) 342
D) 164
Yechim: Ishni hisoblash uchun quyidagi formula ishlatiladi: \[A = F 	imes d\]. Bu yerda \( F = 3 \, 	ext{N} \) (kuch), \( d \) esa harakat masofasi.
Jismning tezlanishini hisoblash uchun \( F = ma \) formulasidan foydalanamiz: \[a =  rac{F}{m} =  rac{3 \, 	ext{N}}{2 \, 	ext{kg}} = 1.5 \, 	ext{m/s}^2.\]
Jismning harakatlangan masofasini hisoblash uchun quyidagi tenglama ishlatiladi: \[d =  rac{1}{2} a t^2 \]. Bu yerda \( t = 6.5 \, 	ext{min} = 390 \, 	ext{s} \).
\[d =  rac{1}{2} 	imes 1.5 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 	imes (390 \, 	ext{s})^2 =  rac{1}{2} 	imes 1.5 	imes 152100 = 114075 \, 	ext{m}.\]
Endi ishni hisoblaymiz: \[A = 3 \, 	ext{N} 	imes 114075 \, 	ext{m} = 342225 \, 	ext{J} = 342.225 \, 	ext{kJ}.\] Demak, javob C.Savol: 2,7 kg massali muz boʻlagi ipga shunday osib qoʻyilganki, muzning chorak hajmi suvga botib turibdi. Ipdagi taranglik kuchini toping.
A) 19,5 N
B) 24 N
C) 18 N
D) 14,4 N
Yechim: Gravitatsion kuch: \[F_{	ext{grav}} = m \cdot g = 2,7 \cdot 10 = 27 \, 	ext{N}\]
Arximed kuchi: Muzning botgan hajmi \(  rac{V}{4} \), shuning uchun: \[F_{	ext{Arx}} = 1000 \cdot  rac{V}{4} \cdot 10 = 2500 \cdot V\]
Muzning hajmi \( V =  rac{2,7}{900} = 0,003 \, 	ext{m}^3 \), shuning uchun: \[F_{	ext{Arx}} = 2500 \cdot 0,003 = 7,5 \, 	ext{N}\]
Taranglik kuchi:\[T = F_{	ext{grav}} - F_{	ext{Arx}} = 27 - 7,5 = 19,5 \, 	ext{N}\] Demak, javob ASavol: 8 m/s tezlik bilan to‘g‘ri chiziqli tekis harakatlanayotgan chang‘ichi 25 s da qancha masofani bosib o‘tadi (m) ?
A) 50
B) 100
C) 150
D) 200
Yechim: To‘g‘ri chiziqli tekis harakatda masofa quyidagi formula bilan hisoblanadi:
\[s = v \cdot t\]
  - \( v \) — tezlik (\( 8 \, 	ext{m/s} \)),
   - \( t \) — vaqt (\( 25 \, 	ext{s} \)).
Masofani hisoblash:\[s = 8 \, 	ext{m/s} \cdot 25 \, 	ext{s} = 200 \, 	ext{m}\] Demak, javob D.

Savol: Jism qanday tezlik bilan vertikal otilsa, u 6 s dan so‘ng otilgan joyiga qaytib tushadi (m/s)?
A) 20
B) 35
C) 30
D) 40
Yechim: Jismning vertikal yo‘nalishdagi harakati uchun, uchish va tushish vaqtlarining yig‘indisi 6 soniya, ya'ni 3 soniya uchish va 3 soniya tushish bo‘ladi (har bir yo‘nalishda teng vaqt).
Tushish va uchish vaqtining 3 sekundini hisobga olgan holda, erkin tushish tezligi \( g = 9.8 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 \) yordamida hisoblanadi.
Uchish va tushishning umumiy vaqti \( t = 6 \, 	ext{s} \), va u uchish vaqtining 3 soniyasida maksimal balandlikka yetadi. Vertikal harakat uchun quyidagi tenglama ishlatiladi:
   \[v_0 = g 	imes t = 9.8 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 	imes 3 \, 	ext{s} = 30 \, 	ext{m/s}.\]  Demak, javob C) 30.Savol: Moddiy nuqta 90 sm radiusli aylana bo‘ylab tekis harakatlanmoqda. Agar u 9 s da 90° ga burilgan bo‘lsa, uning burchak tezligi qancha (rad/s)?
A) 10
B) 45
C) π/18
D) 0,56
Yechim: Aylananing to‘liq burilish burchagi \( 2\pi \) radian. Moddiy nuqta 90° (yoki \(  rac{\pi}{2} \) radian) burilgan. Burchak tezligini hisoblash uchun, burchakni vaqtga bo‘lish kerak: 
\[\omega =  rac{\Delta 	heta}{\Delta t} =  rac{ rac{\pi}{2}}{9 \, 	ext{s}} =  rac{\pi}{18} \, 	ext{rad/s}.\] Demak, javob C.Savol: Dastlab tinch turgan 2 kg massali jism 3 N doimiy kuch ta’sirida tezlashmoqda. 6,5 minut vaqt davomida kuch bajargan ishni (kJ) hisoblang.
A) 98
B) 245
C) 342
D) 164
Yechim: Ishni hisoblash uchun quyidagi formula ishlatiladi: \[A = F 	imes d\]. Bu yerda \( F = 3 \, 	ext{N} \) (kuch), \( d \) esa harakat masofasi.
Jismning tezlanishini hisoblash uchun \( F = ma \) formulasidan foydalanamiz: \[a =  rac{F}{m} =  rac{3 \, 	ext{N}}{2 \, 	ext{kg}} = 1.5 \, 	ext{m/s}^2.\]
Jismning harakatlangan masofasini hisoblash uchun quyidagi tenglama ishlatiladi: \[d =  rac{1}{2} a t^2 \]. Bu yerda \( t = 6.5 \, 	ext{min} = 390 \, 	ext{s} \).
\[d =  rac{1}{2} 	imes 1.5 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 	imes (390 \, 	ext{s})^2 =  rac{1}{2} 	imes 1.5 	imes 152100 = 114075 \, 	ext{m}.\]
Endi ishni hisoblaymiz: \[A = 3 \, 	ext{N} 	imes 114075 \, 	ext{m} = 342225 \, 	ext{J} = 342.225 \, 	ext{kJ}.\] Demak, javob C.Savol: 2,7 kg massali muz boʻlagi ipga shunday osib qoʻyilganki, muzning chorak hajmi suvga botib turibdi. Ipdagi taranglik kuchini toping.
A) 19,5 N
B) 24 N
C) 18 N
D) 14,4 N
Yechim: Gravitatsion kuch: \[F_{	ext{grav}} = m \cdot g = 2,7 \cdot 10 = 27 \, 	ext{N}\]
Arximed kuchi: Muzning botgan hajmi \(  rac{V}{4} \), shuning uchun: \[F_{	ext{Arx}} = 1000 \cdot  rac{V}{4} \cdot 10 = 2500 \cdot V\]
Muzning hajmi \( V =  rac{2,7}{900} = 0,003 \, 	ext{m}^3 \), shuning uchun: \[F_{	ext{Arx}} = 2500 \cdot 0,003 = 7,5 \, 	ext{N}\]
Taranglik kuchi:\[T = F_{	ext{grav}} - F_{	ext{Arx}} = 27 - 7,5 = 19,5 \, 	ext{N}\] Demak, javob ASavol: 8 m/s tezlik bilan to‘g‘ri chiziqli tekis harakatlanayotgan chang‘ichi 25 s da qancha masofani bosib o‘tadi (m) ?
A) 50
B) 100
C) 150
D) 200
Yechim: To‘g‘ri chiziqli tekis harakatda masofa quyidagi formula bilan hisoblanadi:
\[s = v \cdot t\]
  - \( v \) — tezlik (\( 8 \, 	ext{m/s} \)),
   - \( t \) — vaqt (\( 25 \, 	ext{s} \)).
Masofani hisoblash:\[s = 8 \, 	ext{m/s} \cdot 25 \, 	ext{s} = 200 \, 	ext{m}\] Demak, javob D.

\[d =  rac{1}{2} 	imes 1.5 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 	imes (390 \, 	ext{s})^2 =  rac{1}{2} 	imes 1.5 	imes 152100 = 114075 \, 	ext{m}.\]

Yechim: Jismning vertikal yo‘nalishdagi harakati uchun, uchish va tushish vaqtlarining yig‘indisi 6 soniya, ya'ni 3 soniya uchish va 3 soniya tushish bo‘ladi (har bir yo‘nalishda teng vaqt).
Tushish va uchish vaqtining 3 sekundini hisobga olgan holda, erkin tushish tezligi \( g = 9.8 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 \) yordamida hisoblanadi.
Uchish va tushishning umumiy vaqti \( t = 6 \, 	ext{s} \), va u uchish vaqtining 3 soniyasida maksimal balandlikka yetadi. Vertikal harakat uchun quyidagi tenglama ishlatiladi:
   \[v_0 = g 	imes t = 9.8 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 	imes 3 \, 	ext{s} = 30 \, 	ext{m/s}.\]  Demak, javob C) 30.Savol: Moddiy nuqta 90 sm radiusli aylana bo‘ylab tekis harakatlanmoqda. Agar u 9 s da 90° ga burilgan bo‘lsa, uning burchak tezligi qancha (rad/s)?
A) 10
B) 45
C) π/18
D) 0,56
Yechim: Aylananing to‘liq burilish burchagi \( 2\pi \) radian. Moddiy nuqta 90° (yoki \(  rac{\pi}{2} \) radian) burilgan. Burchak tezligini hisoblash uchun, burchakni vaqtga bo‘lish kerak: 
\[\omega =  rac{\Delta 	heta}{\Delta t} =  rac{ rac{\pi}{2}}{9 \, 	ext{s}} =  rac{\pi}{18} \, 	ext{rad/s}.\] Demak, javob C.Savol: Dastlab tinch turgan 2 kg massali jism 3 N doimiy kuch ta’sirida tezlashmoqda. 6,5 minut vaqt davomida kuch bajargan ishni (kJ) hisoblang.
A) 98
B) 245
C) 342
D) 164
Yechim: Ishni hisoblash uchun quyidagi formula ishlatiladi: \[A = F 	imes d\]. Bu yerda \( F = 3 \, 	ext{N} \) (kuch), \( d \) esa harakat masofasi.
Jismning tezlanishini hisoblash uchun \( F = ma \) formulasidan foydalanamiz: \[a =  rac{F}{m} =  rac{3 \, 	ext{N}}{2 \, 	ext{kg}} = 1.5 \, 	ext{m/s}^2.\]
Jismning harakatlangan masofasini hisoblash uchun quyidagi tenglama ishlatiladi: \[d =  rac{1}{2} a t^2 \]. Bu yerda \( t = 6.5 \, 	ext{min} = 390 \, 	ext{s} \).
\[d =  rac{1}{2} 	imes 1.5 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 	imes (390 \, 	ext{s})^2 =  rac{1}{2} 	imes 1.5 	imes 152100 = 114075 \, 	ext{m}.\]
Endi ishni hisoblaymiz: \[A = 3 \, 	ext{N} 	imes 114075 \, 	ext{m} = 342225 \, 	ext{J} = 342.225 \, 	ext{kJ}.\] Demak, javob C.Savol: 2,7 kg massali muz boʻlagi ipga shunday osib qoʻyilganki, muzning chorak hajmi suvga botib turibdi. Ipdagi taranglik kuchini toping.
A) 19,5 N
B) 24 N
C) 18 N
D) 14,4 N
Yechim: Gravitatsion kuch: \[F_{	ext{grav}} = m \cdot g = 2,7 \cdot 10 = 27 \, 	ext{N}\]
Arximed kuchi: Muzning botgan hajmi \(  rac{V}{4} \), shuning uchun: \[F_{	ext{Arx}} = 1000 \cdot  rac{V}{4} \cdot 10 = 2500 \cdot V\]
Muzning hajmi \( V =  rac{2,7}{900} = 0,003 \, 	ext{m}^3 \), shuning uchun: \[F_{	ext{Arx}} = 2500 \cdot 0,003 = 7,5 \, 	ext{N}\]
Taranglik kuchi:\[T = F_{	ext{grav}} - F_{	ext{Arx}} = 27 - 7,5 = 19,5 \, 	ext{N}\] Demak, javob ASavol: 8 m/s tezlik bilan to‘g‘ri chiziqli tekis harakatlanayotgan chang‘ichi 25 s da qancha masofani bosib o‘tadi (m) ?
A) 50
B) 100
C) 150
D) 200
Yechim: To‘g‘ri chiziqli tekis harakatda masofa quyidagi formula bilan hisoblanadi:
\[s = v \cdot t\]
  - \( v \) — tezlik (\( 8 \, 	ext{m/s} \)),
   - \( t \) — vaqt (\( 25 \, 	ext{s} \)).
Masofani hisoblash:\[s = 8 \, 	ext{m/s} \cdot 25 \, 	ext{s} = 200 \, 	ext{m}\] Demak, javob D.

B) 10
C) 8
D) 5
Yechim:

description:
Savol: Jism qanday tezlik bilan vertikal otilsa, u 6 s dan so‘ng otilgan joyiga qaytib tushadi (m/s)?
A) 20
B) 35
C) 30
D) 40
Yechim: Jismning vertikal yo‘nalishdagi harakati uchun, uchish va tushish vaqtlarining yig‘indisi 6 soniya, ya'ni 3 soniya uchish va 3 soniya tushish bo‘ladi (har bir yo‘nalishda teng vaqt).
Tushish va uchish vaqtining 3 sekundini hisobga olgan holda, erkin tushish tezligi \( g = 9.8 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 \) yordamida hisoblanadi.
Uchish va tushishning umumiy vaqti \( t = 6 \, 	ext{s} \), va u uchish vaqtining 3 soniyasida maksimal balandlikka yetadi. Vertikal harakat uchun quyidagi tenglama ishlatiladi:
   \[v_0 = g 	imes t = 9.8 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 	imes 3 \, 	ext{s} = 30 \, 	ext{m/s}.\]  Demak, javob C) 30.Savol: Moddiy nuqta 90 sm radiusli aylana bo‘ylab tekis harakatlanmoqda. Agar u 9 s da 90° ga burilgan bo‘lsa, uning burchak tezligi qancha (rad/s)?
A) 10
B) 45
C) π/18
D) 0,56
Yechim: Aylananing to‘liq burilish burchagi \( 2\pi \) radian. Moddiy nuqta 90° (yoki \(  rac{\pi}{2} \) radian) burilgan. Burchak tezligini hisoblash uchun, burchakni vaqtga bo‘lish kerak: 
\[\omega =  rac{\Delta 	heta}{\Delta t} =  rac{ rac{\pi}{2}}{9 \, 	ext{s}} =  rac{\pi}{18} \, 	ext{rad/s}.\] Demak, javob C.Savol: Dastlab tinch turgan 2 kg massali jism 3 N doimiy kuch ta’sirida tezlashmoqda. 6,5 minut vaqt davomida kuch bajargan ishni (kJ) hisoblang.
A) 98
B) 245
C) 342
D) 164
Yechim: Ishni hisoblash uchun quyidagi formula ishlatiladi: \[A = F 	imes d\]. Bu yerda \( F = 3 \, 	ext{N} \) (kuch), \( d \) esa harakat masofasi.
Jismning tezlanishini hisoblash uchun \( F = ma \) formulasidan foydalanamiz: \[a =  rac{F}{m} =  rac{3 \, 	ext{N}}{2 \, 	ext{kg}} = 1.5 \, 	ext{m/s}^2.\]
Jismning harakatlangan masofasini hisoblash uchun quyidagi tenglama ishlatiladi: \[d =  rac{1}{2} a t^2 \]. Bu yerda \( t = 6.5 \, 	ext{min} = 390 \, 	ext{s} \).
\[d =  rac{1}{2} 	imes 1.5 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 	imes (390 \, 	ext{s})^2 =  rac{1}{2} 	imes 1.5 	imes 152100 = 114075 \, 	ext{m}.\]
Endi ishni hisoblaymiz: \[A = 3 \, 	ext{N} 	imes 114075 \, 	ext{m} = 342225 \, 	ext{J} = 342.225 \, 	ext{kJ}.\] Demak, javob C.Savol: 2,7 kg massali muz boʻlagi ipga shunday osib qoʻyilganki, muzning chorak hajmi suvga botib turibdi. Ipdagi taranglik kuchini toping.
A) 19,5 N
B) 24 N
C) 18 N
D) 14,4 N
Yechim: Gravitatsion kuch: \[F_{	ext{grav}} = m \cdot g = 2,7 \cdot 10 = 27 \, 	ext{N}\]
Arximed kuchi: Muzning botgan hajmi \(  rac{V}{4} \), shuning uchun: \[F_{	ext{Arx}} = 1000 \cdot  rac{V}{4} \cdot 10 = 2500 \cdot V\]
Muzning hajmi \( V =  rac{2,7}{900} = 0,003 \, 	ext{m}^3 \), shuning uchun: \[F_{	ext{Arx}} = 2500 \cdot 0,003 = 7,5 \, 	ext{N}\]
Taranglik kuchi:\[T = F_{	ext{grav}} - F_{	ext{Arx}} = 27 - 7,5 = 19,5 \, 	ext{N}\] Demak, javob ASavol: 8 m/s tezlik bilan to‘g‘ri chiziqli tekis harakatlanayotgan chang‘ichi 25 s da qancha masofani bosib o‘tadi (m) ?
A) 50
B) 100
C) 150
D) 200
Yechim: To‘g‘ri chiziqli tekis harakatda masofa quyidagi formula bilan hisoblanadi:
\[s = v \cdot t\]
  - \( v \) — tezlik (\( 8 \, 	ext{m/s} \)),
   - \( t \) — vaqt (\( 25 \, 	ext{s} \)).
Masofani hisoblash:\[s = 8 \, 	ext{m/s} \cdot 25 \, 	ext{s} = 200 \, 	ext{m}\] Demak, javob D.

Savol: Zaryadi 2 mkC dan bo‘lgan uchta nuqtaviy zaryadlar bir to‘g‘ri chiziqda, bir biridan 30 cm masofada joylashtirilgan. Zaryadlarning o‘zaro ta`sir potensial energiyasini hisoblang (mJ)?
A) 400
B) 300
C) 150
D) 480
Yechim:

description:
Savol: Jism qanday tezlik bilan vertikal otilsa, u 6 s dan so‘ng otilgan joyiga qaytib tushadi (m/s)?
A) 20
B) 35
C) 30
D) 40
Yechim: Jismning vertikal yo‘nalishdagi harakati uchun, uchish va tushish vaqtlarining yig‘indisi 6 soniya, ya'ni 3 soniya uchish va 3 soniya tushish bo‘ladi (har bir yo‘nalishda teng vaqt).
Tushish va uchish vaqtining 3 sekundini hisobga olgan holda, erkin tushish tezligi \( g = 9.8 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 \) yordamida hisoblanadi.
Uchish va tushishning umumiy vaqti \( t = 6 \, 	ext{s} \), va u uchish vaqtining 3 soniyasida maksimal balandlikka yetadi. Vertikal harakat uchun quyidagi tenglama ishlatiladi:
   \[v_0 = g 	imes t = 9.8 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 	imes 3 \, 	ext{s} = 30 \, 	ext{m/s}.\]  Demak, javob C) 30.Savol: Moddiy nuqta 90 sm radiusli aylana bo‘ylab tekis harakatlanmoqda. Agar u 9 s da 90° ga burilgan bo‘lsa, uning burchak tezligi qancha (rad/s)?
A) 10
B) 45
C) π/18
D) 0,56
Yechim: Aylananing to‘liq burilish burchagi \( 2\pi \) radian. Moddiy nuqta 90° (yoki \(  rac{\pi}{2} \) radian) burilgan. Burchak tezligini hisoblash uchun, burchakni vaqtga bo‘lish kerak: 
\[\omega =  rac{\Delta 	heta}{\Delta t} =  rac{ rac{\pi}{2}}{9 \, 	ext{s}} =  rac{\pi}{18} \, 	ext{rad/s}.\] Demak, javob C.Savol: Dastlab tinch turgan 2 kg massali jism 3 N doimiy kuch ta’sirida tezlashmoqda. 6,5 minut vaqt davomida kuch bajargan ishni (kJ) hisoblang.
A) 98
B) 245
C) 342
D) 164
Yechim: Ishni hisoblash uchun quyidagi formula ishlatiladi: \[A = F 	imes d\]. Bu yerda \( F = 3 \, 	ext{N} \) (kuch), \( d \) esa harakat masofasi.
Jismning tezlanishini hisoblash uchun \( F = ma \) formulasidan foydalanamiz: \[a =  rac{F}{m} =  rac{3 \, 	ext{N}}{2 \, 	ext{kg}} = 1.5 \, 	ext{m/s}^2.\]
Jismning harakatlangan masofasini hisoblash uchun quyidagi tenglama ishlatiladi: \[d =  rac{1}{2} a t^2 \]. Bu yerda \( t = 6.5 \, 	ext{min} = 390 \, 	ext{s} \).
\[d =  rac{1}{2} 	imes 1.5 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 	imes (390 \, 	ext{s})^2 =  rac{1}{2} 	imes 1.5 	imes 152100 = 114075 \, 	ext{m}.\]
Endi ishni hisoblaymiz: \[A = 3 \, 	ext{N} 	imes 114075 \, 	ext{m} = 342225 \, 	ext{J} = 342.225 \, 	ext{kJ}.\] Demak, javob C.Savol: 2,7 kg massali muz boʻlagi ipga shunday osib qoʻyilganki, muzning chorak hajmi suvga botib turibdi. Ipdagi taranglik kuchini toping.
A) 19,5 N
B) 24 N
C) 18 N
D) 14,4 N
Yechim: Gravitatsion kuch: \[F_{	ext{grav}} = m \cdot g = 2,7 \cdot 10 = 27 \, 	ext{N}\]
Arximed kuchi: Muzning botgan hajmi \(  rac{V}{4} \), shuning uchun: \[F_{	ext{Arx}} = 1000 \cdot  rac{V}{4} \cdot 10 = 2500 \cdot V\]
Muzning hajmi \( V =  rac{2,7}{900} = 0,003 \, 	ext{m}^3 \), shuning uchun: \[F_{	ext{Arx}} = 2500 \cdot 0,003 = 7,5 \, 	ext{N}\]
Taranglik kuchi:\[T = F_{	ext{grav}} - F_{	ext{Arx}} = 27 - 7,5 = 19,5 \, 	ext{N}\] Demak, javob ASavol: 8 m/s tezlik bilan to‘g‘ri chiziqli tekis harakatlanayotgan chang‘ichi 25 s da qancha masofani bosib o‘tadi (m) ?
A) 50
B) 100
C) 150
D) 200
Yechim: To‘g‘ri chiziqli tekis harakatda masofa quyidagi formula bilan hisoblanadi:
\[s = v \cdot t\]
  - \( v \) — tezlik (\( 8 \, 	ext{m/s} \)),
   - \( t \) — vaqt (\( 25 \, 	ext{s} \)).
Masofani hisoblash:\[s = 8 \, 	ext{m/s} \cdot 25 \, 	ext{s} = 200 \, 	ext{m}\] Demak, javob D.

Savol: Jism qanday tezlik bilan vertikal otilsa, u 6 s dan so‘ng otilgan joyiga qaytib tushadi (m/s)?
A) 20
B) 35
C) 30
D) 40
Yechim: Jismning vertikal yo‘nalishdagi harakati uchun, uchish va tushish vaqtlarining yig‘indisi 6 soniya, ya'ni 3 soniya uchish va 3 soniya tushish bo‘ladi (har bir yo‘nalishda teng vaqt).
Tushish va uchish vaqtining 3 sekundini hisobga olgan holda, erkin tushish tezligi \( g = 9.8 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 \) yordamida hisoblanadi.
Uchish va tushishning umumiy vaqti \( t = 6 \, 	ext{s} \), va u uchish vaqtining 3 soniyasida maksimal balandlikka yetadi. Vertikal harakat uchun quyidagi tenglama ishlatiladi:
   \[v_0 = g 	imes t = 9.8 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 	imes 3 \, 	ext{s} = 30 \, 	ext{m/s}.\]  Demak, javob C) 30.Savol: Moddiy nuqta 90 sm radiusli aylana bo‘ylab tekis harakatlanmoqda. Agar u 9 s da 90° ga burilgan bo‘lsa, uning burchak tezligi qancha (rad/s)?
A) 10
B) 45
C) π/18
D) 0,56
Yechim: Aylananing to‘liq burilish burchagi \( 2\pi \) radian. Moddiy nuqta 90° (yoki \(  rac{\pi}{2} \) radian) burilgan. Burchak tezligini hisoblash uchun, burchakni vaqtga bo‘lish kerak: 
\[\omega =  rac{\Delta 	heta}{\Delta t} =  rac{ rac{\pi}{2}}{9 \, 	ext{s}} =  rac{\pi}{18} \, 	ext{rad/s}.\] Demak, javob C.Savol: Dastlab tinch turgan 2 kg massali jism 3 N doimiy kuch ta’sirida tezlashmoqda. 6,5 minut vaqt davomida kuch bajargan ishni (kJ) hisoblang.
A) 98
B) 245
C) 342
D) 164
Yechim: Ishni hisoblash uchun quyidagi formula ishlatiladi: \[A = F 	imes d\]. Bu yerda \( F = 3 \, 	ext{N} \) (kuch), \( d \) esa harakat masofasi.
Jismning tezlanishini hisoblash uchun \( F = ma \) formulasidan foydalanamiz: \[a =  rac{F}{m} =  rac{3 \, 	ext{N}}{2 \, 	ext{kg}} = 1.5 \, 	ext{m/s}^2.\]
Jismning harakatlangan masofasini hisoblash uchun quyidagi tenglama ishlatiladi: \[d =  rac{1}{2} a t^2 \]. Bu yerda \( t = 6.5 \, 	ext{min} = 390 \, 	ext{s} \).
\[d =  rac{1}{2} 	imes 1.5 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 	imes (390 \, 	ext{s})^2 =  rac{1}{2} 	imes 1.5 	imes 152100 = 114075 \, 	ext{m}.\]

A) 19,5 N
B) 24 N
C) 18 N
D) 14,4 N
Yechim: Gravitatsion kuch: \[F_{	ext{grav}} = m \cdot g = 2,7 \cdot 10 = 27 \, 	ext{N}\]
Arximed kuchi: Muzning botgan hajmi \(  rac{V}{4} \), shuning uchun: \[F_{	ext{Arx}} = 1000 \cdot  rac{V}{4} \cdot 10 = 2500 \cdot V\]
Muzning hajmi \( V =  rac{2,7}{900} = 0,003 \, 	ext{m}^3 \), shuning uchun: \[F_{	ext{Arx}} = 2500 \cdot 0,003 = 7,5 \, 	ext{N}\]
Taranglik kuchi:\[T = F_{	ext{grav}} - F_{	ext{Arx}} = 27 - 7,5 = 19,5 \, 	ext{N}\] Demak, javob ASavol: 8 m/s tezlik bilan to‘g‘ri chiziqli tekis harakatlanayotgan chang‘ichi 25 s da qancha masofani bosib o‘tadi (m) ?
A) 50
B) 100
C) 150
D) 200
Yechim: To‘g‘ri chiziqli tekis harakatda masofa quyidagi formula bilan hisoblanadi:
\[s = v \cdot t\]
  - \( v \) — tezlik (\( 8 \, 	ext{m/s} \)),
   - \( t \) — vaqt (\( 25 \, 	ext{s} \)).
Masofani hisoblash:\[s = 8 \, 	ext{m/s} \cdot 25 \, 	ext{s} = 200 \, 	ext{m}\] Demak, javob D.

Jismning harakatlangan masofasini hisoblash uchun quyidagi tenglama ishlatiladi: \[d =  rac{1}{2} a t^2 \]. Bu yerda \( t = 6.5 \, 	ext{min} = 390 \, 	ext{s} \).
\[d =  rac{1}{2} 	imes 1.5 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 	imes (390 \, 	ext{s})^2 =  rac{1}{2} 	imes 1.5 	imes 152100 = 114075 \, 	ext{m}.\]

B) 24 N
C) 18 N
D) 14,4 N

B) 100
C) 150
D) 200

\[s = v \cdot t\]
  - \( v \) — tezlik (\( 8 \, 	ext{m/s} \)),
   - \( t \) — vaqt (\( 25 \, 	ext{s} \)).
Masofani hisoblash:\[s = 8 \, 	ext{m/s} \cdot 25 \, 	ext{s} = 200 \, 	ext{m}\] Demak, javob D.

Taranglik kuchi:\[T = F_{	ext{grav}} - F_{	ext{Arx}} = 27 - 7,5 = 19,5 \, 	ext{N}\] Demak, javob ASavol: 8 m/s tezlik bilan to‘g‘ri chiziqli tekis harakatlanayotgan chang‘ichi 25 s da qancha masofani bosib o‘tadi (m) ?

\[s = v \cdot t\]
  - \( v \) — tezlik (\( 8 \, 	ext{m/s} \)),

Masofani hisoblash:\[s = 8 \, 	ext{m/s} \cdot 25 \, 	ext{s} = 200 \, 	ext{m}\] Demak, javob D.

\[d =  rac{1}{2} 	imes 1.5 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 	imes (390 \, 	ext{s})^2 =  rac{1}{2} 	imes 1.5 	imes 152100 = 114075 \, 	ext{m}.\]

B) 35
C) 30

B) 45

\[d =  rac{1}{2} 	imes 1.5 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 	imes (390 \, 	ext{s})^2 =  rac{1}{2} 	imes 1.5 	imes 152100 = 114075 \, 	ext{m}.\]

B) 24 N
C) 18 N
D) 14,4 N

Arximed kuchi: Muzning botgan hajmi \(  rac{V}{4} \), shuning uchun: \[F_{	ext{Arx}} = 1000 \cdot  rac{V}{4} \cdot 10 = 2500 \cdot V\]
Muzning hajmi \( V =  rac{2,7}{900} = 0,003 \, 	ext{m}^3 \), shuning uchun: \[F_{	ext{Arx}} = 2500 \cdot 0,003 = 7,5 \, 	ext{N}\]
Taranglik kuchi:\[T = F_{	ext{grav}} - F_{	ext{Arx}} = 27 - 7,5 = 19,5 \, 	ext{N}\] Demak, javob ASavol: 8 m/s tezlik bilan to‘g‘ri chiziqli tekis harakatlanayotgan chang‘ichi 25 s da qancha masofani bosib o‘tadi (m) ?
A) 50
B) 100
C) 150
D) 200

\[s = v \cdot t\]
  - \( v \) — tezlik (\( 8 \, 	ext{m/s} \)),
   - \( t \) — vaqt (\( 25 \, 	ext{s} \)).
Masofani hisoblash:\[s = 8 \, 	ext{m/s} \cdot 25 \, 	ext{s} = 200 \, 	ext{m}\] Demak, javob D.

\[d =  rac{1}{2} 	imes 1.5 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 	imes (390 \, 	ext{s})^2 =  rac{1}{2} 	imes 1.5 	imes 152100 = 114075 \, 	ext{m}.\]

\[d =  rac{1}{2} 	imes 1.5 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 	imes (390 \, 	ext{s})^2 =  rac{1}{2} 	imes 1.5 	imes 152100 = 114075 \, 	ext{m}.\]

   \[v_0 = g 	imes t = 9.8 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 	imes 3 \, 	ext{s} = 30 \, 	ext{m/s}.\]  Demak, javob C) 30.Savol: Moddiy nuqta 90 sm radiusli aylana bo‘ylab tekis harakatlanmoqda. Agar u 9 s da 90° ga burilgan bo‘lsa, uning burchak tezligi qancha (rad/s)?

B) 45

\[d =  rac{1}{2} 	imes 1.5 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 	imes (390 \, 	ext{s})^2 =  rac{1}{2} 	imes 1.5 	imes 152100 = 114075 \, 	ext{m}.\]

B) 24 N
C) 18 N
D) 14,4 N

Arximed kuchi: Muzning botgan hajmi \(  rac{V}{4} \), shuning uchun: \[F_{	ext{Arx}} = 1000 \cdot  rac{V}{4} \cdot 10 = 2500 \cdot V\]

Taranglik kuchi:\[T = F_{	ext{grav}} - F_{	ext{Arx}} = 27 - 7,5 = 19,5 \, 	ext{N}\] Demak, javob ASavol: 8 m/s tezlik bilan to‘g‘ri chiziqli tekis harakatlanayotgan chang‘ichi 25 s da qancha masofani bosib o‘tadi (m) ?
A) 50
B) 100

D) 200

\[s = v \cdot t\]
  - \( v \) — tezlik (\( 8 \, 	ext{m/s} \)),
   - \( t \) — vaqt (\( 25 \, 	ext{s} \)).
Masofani hisoblash:\[s = 8 \, 	ext{m/s} \cdot 25 \, 	ext{s} = 200 \, 	ext{m}\] Demak, javob D.

B) 245
C) 342
D) 164
Yechim: Ishni hisoblash uchun quyidagi formula ishlatiladi: \[A = F 	imes d\]. Bu yerda \( F = 3 \, 	ext{N} \) (kuch), \( d \) esa harakat masofasi.
Jismning tezlanishini hisoblash uchun \( F = ma \) formulasidan foydalanamiz: \[a =  rac{F}{m} =  rac{3 \, 	ext{N}}{2 \, 	ext{kg}} = 1.5 \, 	ext{m/s}^2.\]
Jismning harakatlangan masofasini hisoblash uchun quyidagi tenglama ishlatiladi: \[d =  rac{1}{2} a t^2 \]. Bu yerda \( t = 6.5 \, 	ext{min} = 390 \, 	ext{s} \).
\[d =  rac{1}{2} 	imes 1.5 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 	imes (390 \, 	ext{s})^2 =  rac{1}{2} 	imes 1.5 	imes 152100 = 114075 \, 	ext{m}.\]

A) 19,5 N
B) 24 N
C) 18 N
D) 14,4 N
Yechim: Gravitatsion kuch: \[F_{	ext{grav}} = m \cdot g = 2,7 \cdot 10 = 27 \, 	ext{N}\]
Arximed kuchi: Muzning botgan hajmi \(  rac{V}{4} \), shuning uchun: \[F_{	ext{Arx}} = 1000 \cdot  rac{V}{4} \cdot 10 = 2500 \cdot V\]

A) 50
B) 100
C) 150
D) 200

\[s = v \cdot t\]
  - \( v \) — tezlik (\( 8 \, 	ext{m/s} \)),
   - \( t \) — vaqt (\( 25 \, 	ext{s} \)).
Masofani hisoblash:\[s = 8 \, 	ext{m/s} \cdot 25 \, 	ext{s} = 200 \, 	ext{m}\] Demak, javob D.

\[d =  rac{1}{2} 	imes 1.5 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 	imes (390 \, 	ext{s})^2 =  rac{1}{2} 	imes 1.5 	imes 152100 = 114075 \, 	ext{m}.\]

   \[v_0 = g 	imes t = 9.8 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 	imes 3 \, 	ext{s} = 30 \, 	ext{m/s}.\]  Demak, javob C) 30.Savol: Moddiy nuqta 90 sm radiusli aylana bo‘ylab tekis harakatlanmoqda. Agar u 9 s da 90° ga burilgan bo‘lsa, uning burchak tezligi qancha (rad/s)?
A) 10
B) 45
C) π/18
D) 0,56
Yechim: Aylananing to‘liq burilish burchagi \( 2\pi \) radian. Moddiy nuqta 90° (yoki \(  rac{\pi}{2} \) radian) burilgan. Burchak tezligini hisoblash uchun, burchakni vaqtga bo‘lish kerak: 
\[\omega =  rac{\Delta 	heta}{\Delta t} =  rac{ rac{\pi}{2}}{9 \, 	ext{s}} =  rac{\pi}{18} \, 	ext{rad/s}.\] Demak, javob C.Savol: Dastlab tinch turgan 2 kg massali jism 3 N doimiy kuch ta’sirida tezlashmoqda. 6,5 minut vaqt davomida kuch bajargan ishni (kJ) hisoblang.
A) 98
B) 245
C) 342
D) 164
Yechim: Ishni hisoblash uchun quyidagi formula ishlatiladi: \[A = F 	imes d\]. Bu yerda \( F = 3 \, 	ext{N} \) (kuch), \( d \) esa harakat masofasi.
Jismning tezlanishini hisoblash uchun \( F = ma \) formulasidan foydalanamiz: \[a =  rac{F}{m} =  rac{3 \, 	ext{N}}{2 \, 	ext{kg}} = 1.5 \, 	ext{m/s}^2.\]
Jismning harakatlangan masofasini hisoblash uchun quyidagi tenglama ishlatiladi: \[d =  rac{1}{2} a t^2 \]. Bu yerda \( t = 6.5 \, 	ext{min} = 390 \, 	ext{s} \).
\[d =  rac{1}{2} 	imes 1.5 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 	imes (390 \, 	ext{s})^2 =  rac{1}{2} 	imes 1.5 	imes 152100 = 114075 \, 	ext{m}.\]
Endi ishni hisoblaymiz: \[A = 3 \, 	ext{N} 	imes 114075 \, 	ext{m} = 342225 \, 	ext{J} = 342.225 \, 	ext{kJ}.\] Demak, javob C.Savol: 2,7 kg massali muz boʻlagi ipga shunday osib qoʻyilganki, muzning chorak hajmi suvga botib turibdi. Ipdagi taranglik kuchini toping.
A) 19,5 N
B) 24 N
C) 18 N
D) 14,4 N
Yechim: Gravitatsion kuch: \[F_{	ext{grav}} = m \cdot g = 2,7 \cdot 10 = 27 \, 	ext{N}\]
Arximed kuchi: Muzning botgan hajmi \(  rac{V}{4} \), shuning uchun: \[F_{	ext{Arx}} = 1000 \cdot  rac{V}{4} \cdot 10 = 2500 \cdot V\]
Muzning hajmi \( V =  rac{2,7}{900} = 0,003 \, 	ext{m}^3 \), shuning uchun: \[F_{	ext{Arx}} = 2500 \cdot 0,003 = 7,5 \, 	ext{N}\]
Taranglik kuchi:\[T = F_{	ext{grav}} - F_{	ext{Arx}} = 27 - 7,5 = 19,5 \, 	ext{N}\] Demak, javob ASavol: 8 m/s tezlik bilan to‘g‘ri chiziqli tekis harakatlanayotgan chang‘ichi 25 s da qancha masofani bosib o‘tadi (m) ?
A) 50
B) 100
C) 150
D) 200
Yechim: To‘g‘ri chiziqli tekis harakatda masofa quyidagi formula bilan hisoblanadi:
\[s = v \cdot t\]
  - \( v \) — tezlik (\( 8 \, 	ext{m/s} \)),
   - \( t \) — vaqt (\( 25 \, 	ext{s} \)).
Masofani hisoblash:\[s = 8 \, 	ext{m/s} \cdot 25 \, 	ext{s} = 200 \, 	ext{m}\] Demak, javob D.

Yechim: Jismning vertikal yo‘nalishdagi harakati uchun, uchish va tushish vaqtlarining yig‘indisi 6 soniya, ya'ni 3 soniya uchish va 3 soniya tushish bo‘ladi (har bir yo‘nalishda teng vaqt).
Tushish va uchish vaqtining 3 sekundini hisobga olgan holda, erkin tushish tezligi \( g = 9.8 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 \) yordamida hisoblanadi.
Uchish va tushishning umumiy vaqti \( t = 6 \, 	ext{s} \), va u uchish vaqtining 3 soniyasida maksimal balandlikka yetadi. Vertikal harakat uchun quyidagi tenglama ishlatiladi:
   \[v_0 = g 	imes t = 9.8 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 	imes 3 \, 	ext{s} = 30 \, 	ext{m/s}.\]  Demak, javob C) 30.Savol: Moddiy nuqta 90 sm radiusli aylana bo‘ylab tekis harakatlanmoqda. Agar u 9 s da 90° ga burilgan bo‘lsa, uning burchak tezligi qancha (rad/s)?
A) 10
B) 45
C) π/18
D) 0,56
Yechim: Aylananing to‘liq burilish burchagi \( 2\pi \) radian. Moddiy nuqta 90° (yoki \(  rac{\pi}{2} \) radian) burilgan. Burchak tezligini hisoblash uchun, burchakni vaqtga bo‘lish kerak: 
\[\omega =  rac{\Delta 	heta}{\Delta t} =  rac{ rac{\pi}{2}}{9 \, 	ext{s}} =  rac{\pi}{18} \, 	ext{rad/s}.\] Demak, javob C.Savol: Dastlab tinch turgan 2 kg massali jism 3 N doimiy kuch ta’sirida tezlashmoqda. 6,5 minut vaqt davomida kuch bajargan ishni (kJ) hisoblang.
A) 98
B) 245
C) 342
D) 164
Yechim: Ishni hisoblash uchun quyidagi formula ishlatiladi: \[A = F 	imes d\]. Bu yerda \( F = 3 \, 	ext{N} \) (kuch), \( d \) esa harakat masofasi.
Jismning tezlanishini hisoblash uchun \( F = ma \) formulasidan foydalanamiz: \[a =  rac{F}{m} =  rac{3 \, 	ext{N}}{2 \, 	ext{kg}} = 1.5 \, 	ext{m/s}^2.\]
Jismning harakatlangan masofasini hisoblash uchun quyidagi tenglama ishlatiladi: \[d =  rac{1}{2} a t^2 \]. Bu yerda \( t = 6.5 \, 	ext{min} = 390 \, 	ext{s} \).
\[d =  rac{1}{2} 	imes 1.5 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 	imes (390 \, 	ext{s})^2 =  rac{1}{2} 	imes 1.5 	imes 152100 = 114075 \, 	ext{m}.\]
Endi ishni hisoblaymiz: \[A = 3 \, 	ext{N} 	imes 114075 \, 	ext{m} = 342225 \, 	ext{J} = 342.225 \, 	ext{kJ}.\] Demak, javob C.Savol: 2,7 kg massali muz boʻlagi ipga shunday osib qoʻyilganki, muzning chorak hajmi suvga botib turibdi. Ipdagi taranglik kuchini toping.
A) 19,5 N
B) 24 N
C) 18 N
D) 14,4 N
Yechim: Gravitatsion kuch: \[F_{	ext{grav}} = m \cdot g = 2,7 \cdot 10 = 27 \, 	ext{N}\]
Arximed kuchi: Muzning botgan hajmi \(  rac{V}{4} \), shuning uchun: \[F_{	ext{Arx}} = 1000 \cdot  rac{V}{4} \cdot 10 = 2500 \cdot V\]

Taranglik kuchi:\[T = F_{	ext{grav}} - F_{	ext{Arx}} = 27 - 7,5 = 19,5 \, 	ext{N}\] Demak, javob ASavol: 8 m/s tezlik bilan to‘g‘ri chiziqli tekis harakatlanayotgan chang‘ichi 25 s da qancha masofani bosib o‘tadi (m) ?
A) 50
B) 100
C) 150
D) 200
Yechim: To‘g‘ri chiziqli tekis harakatda masofa quyidagi formula bilan hisoblanadi:
\[s = v \cdot t\]
  - \( v \) — tezlik (\( 8 \, 	ext{m/s} \)),
   - \( t \) — vaqt (\( 25 \, 	ext{s} \)).
Masofani hisoblash:\[s = 8 \, 	ext{m/s} \cdot 25 \, 	ext{s} = 200 \, 	ext{m}\] Demak, javob D.

Yechim: Jismning vertikal yo‘nalishdagi harakati uchun, uchish va tushish vaqtlarining yig‘indisi 6 soniya, ya'ni 3 soniya uchish va 3 soniya tushish bo‘ladi (har bir yo‘nalishda teng vaqt).
Tushish va uchish vaqtining 3 sekundini hisobga olgan holda, erkin tushish tezligi \( g = 9.8 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 \) yordamida hisoblanadi.
Uchish va tushishning umumiy vaqti \( t = 6 \, 	ext{s} \), va u uchish vaqtining 3 soniyasida maksimal balandlikka yetadi. Vertikal harakat uchun quyidagi tenglama ishlatiladi:
   \[v_0 = g 	imes t = 9.8 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 	imes 3 \, 	ext{s} = 30 \, 	ext{m/s}.\]  Demak, javob C) 30.Savol: Moddiy nuqta 90 sm radiusli aylana bo‘ylab tekis harakatlanmoqda. Agar u 9 s da 90° ga burilgan bo‘lsa, uning burchak tezligi qancha (rad/s)?
A) 10
B) 45
C) π/18
D) 0,56
Yechim: Aylananing to‘liq burilish burchagi \( 2\pi \) radian. Moddiy nuqta 90° (yoki \(  rac{\pi}{2} \) radian) burilgan. Burchak tezligini hisoblash uchun, burchakni vaqtga bo‘lish kerak: 
\[\omega =  rac{\Delta 	heta}{\Delta t} =  rac{ rac{\pi}{2}}{9 \, 	ext{s}} =  rac{\pi}{18} \, 	ext{rad/s}.\] Demak, javob C.Savol: Dastlab tinch turgan 2 kg massali jism 3 N doimiy kuch ta’sirida tezlashmoqda. 6,5 minut vaqt davomida kuch bajargan ishni (kJ) hisoblang.
A) 98
B) 245
C) 342
D) 164
Yechim: Ishni hisoblash uchun quyidagi formula ishlatiladi: \[A = F 	imes d\]. Bu yerda \( F = 3 \, 	ext{N} \) (kuch), \( d \) esa harakat masofasi.
Jismning tezlanishini hisoblash uchun \( F = ma \) formulasidan foydalanamiz: \[a =  rac{F}{m} =  rac{3 \, 	ext{N}}{2 \, 	ext{kg}} = 1.5 \, 	ext{m/s}^2.\]
Jismning harakatlangan masofasini hisoblash uchun quyidagi tenglama ishlatiladi: \[d =  rac{1}{2} a t^2 \]. Bu yerda \( t = 6.5 \, 	ext{min} = 390 \, 	ext{s} \).
\[d =  rac{1}{2} 	imes 1.5 \, 	ext{m/s}^2 	imes (390 \, 	ext{s})^2 =  rac{1}{2} 	imes 1.5 	imes 152100 = 114075 \, 	ext{m}.\]
Endi ishni hisoblaymiz: \[A = 3 \, 	ext{N} 	imes 114075 \, 	ext{m} = 342225 \, 	ext{J} = 342.225 \, 	ext{kJ}.\] Demak, javob C.Savol: 2,7 kg massali muz boʻlagi ipga shunday osib qoʻyilganki, muzning chorak hajmi suvga botib turibdi. Ipdagi taranglik kuchini toping.
A) 19,5 N
B) 24 N
C) 18 N
D) 14,4 N
Yechim: Gravitatsion kuch: \[F_{	ext{grav}} = m \cdot g = 2,7 \cdot 10 = 27 \, 	ext{N}\]
Arximed kuchi: Muzning botgan hajmi \(  rac{V}{4} \), shuning uchun: \[F_{	ext{Arx}} = 1000 \cdot  rac{V}{4} \cdot 10 = 2500 \cdot V\]
Muzning hajmi \( V =  rac{2,7}{900} = 0,003 \, 	ext{m}^3 \), shuning uchun: \[F_{	ext{Arx}} = 2500 \cdot 0,003 = 7,5 \, 	ext{N}\]
Taranglik kuchi:\[T = F_{	ext{grav}} - F_{	ext{Arx}} = 27 - 7,5 = 19,5 \, 	ext{N}\] Demak, javob ASavol: 8 m/s tezlik bilan to‘g‘ri chiziqli tekis harakatlanayotgan chang‘ichi 25 s da qancha masofani bosib o‘tadi (m) ?
A) 50
B) 100
C) 150
D) 200
Yechim: To‘g‘ri chiziqli tekis harakatda masofa quyidagi formula bilan hisoblanadi:
\[s = v \cdot t\]
  - \( v \) — tezlik (\( 8 \, 	ext{m/s} \)),
   - \( t \) — vaqt (\( 25 \, 	ext{s} \)).
Masofani hisoblash:\[s = 8 \, 	ext{m/s} \cdot 25 \, 	ext{s} = 200 \, 	ext{m}\] Demak, javob D.
